messages.subject: School lines
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, Kim again, promise to shut up soon!  :) Mary s last mail about standing in lines brought a memory back that still makes me mad. Last year when we moved
messages.messageBody:
Hi, Kim again, promise to shut up soon! :)

Mary's last mail about standing in lines brought a memory back that still
makes me mad.

Last year when we moved here I went to the school's to borrow books for
homeschooling. As I was walking in to the office, a class of children and
their teacher were walking in from recess. One child told another he was
going to kick his a@@. I was horrified and thought for the teacher, about
three feet away, would surely put him in his place. Nope. The line
continued on into to the school so that the children could be good little
soldiers and sit at their desks and "learn".

Kim from Pa
